item.title: 333 - Excuses and Rationalizations Are Not Valid… And We Know That (Dan Cnossen)
item.description: 333 - Excuses and Rationalizations Are Not Valid… And We Know That (Dan Cnossen) Excuses and Rationalizations [[The Log]] Breaking down long term goals into short term procedures The next ball, the next step [[Focus on the Next Step]] Think about this when playing tennis

item.title: Focus on the Next Step
item.description: Focus on the Next Step Even when you have [[What Do I Want to Do?|Long Term Goals]], it’s possible for it to work against you.

item.title: You Laugh at Me Because I'm Different, I Laugh at You Because You're All the Same.
item.description: You Laugh at Me Because I’m Different, I Laugh at You Because You’re All the Same. —[[Johnathan Davis]]
